error.db_delete_zero: Failed to delete; No entries were found
error.db_delete_one: Failed to delete just one entry; Based on filters multiple entries were found
error.db_restore_one: Failed to restore just one entry; Based on filters multiple entries were found
error.db_delete_missing_filter: Failed to delete entries; No filter were provided
error.db_restore_missing_filter: Failed to restore entries; No filter were provided
error.db_select_count_while_using_raw: Cannot use count while using raw query
error.db_select_count_while_using_groups: Cannot use count while using groups

validation.invalid_boolean: Field must have a boolean value
validation.string_min: Field value must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.params_at_least_one: At least one parameter is required (eg: {{params}})
validation.meta_title_invalid: Meta title must be a string
validation.meta_description_invalid: Meta description must be a string
validation.meta_keywords_invalid: Meta keywords must be a string

debug.email_error: Failed to send email with subject `{{subject}}` to `{{to}}` (eg: {{error}})
debug.email_sent: Email with subject `{{subject}}` sent successfully to `{{to}}`

message.default: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
message.login: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
